${ModID}:Clownfish.NAME: Clownfish
${ModID}:Clownfish.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Guppy.NAME: Guppy
${ModID}:Guppy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Hammerhead.NAME: Hammerhead
${ModID}:Hammerhead.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Orca.NAME: Orca
${ModID}:Orca.DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Orca.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Play the top card of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Play the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Retain. NL Play the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Piranha.NAME: Piranha
${ModID}:Piranha.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Qwilfish.NAME: Qwilfish
${ModID}:Qwilfish.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SeaMonster.NAME: Sea Monster
${ModID}:SeaMonster.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Attacks into your hand. NL They cost 0 this turn and gain Exhaust. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:SeaMonster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Upgraded Attacks into your hand. NL They cost 0 this turn and gain Exhaust. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Shark.NAME: Shark
${ModID}:Shark.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Starfish.NAME: Starfish
${ModID}:Starfish.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CastLine.NAME: Cast Line
${ModID}:CastLine.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card.

${ModID}:SetSail.NAME: Set Sail
${ModID}:SetSail.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Put 1 card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:SetSail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Put 1 card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:MopUp.NAME: Mop Up
${ModID}:MopUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL If it's a Curse or Status, gain [E] and draw a card.

${ModID}:Sunhat.NAME: Sunhat
${ModID}:Sunhat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Remove your Weak.

${ModID}:ThatsAllFolks.NAME: That's All, Folks!
${ModID}:ThatsAllFolks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Solo: Deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:ScavengedShield.NAME: Scavenged Shield
${ModID}:ScavengedShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Voyaged: Gain !B! Block again.

${ModID}:Wander.NAME: Wander
${ModID}:Wander.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Discard your hand, then draw !M! card.
${ModID}:Wander.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Discard your hand, then draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:SurpriseAttack.NAME: Surprise Attack
${ModID}:SurpriseAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL ${ModID}:Voyaged: Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:BagOfDefends.NAME: Bag of Defends
${ModID}:BagOfDefends.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. NL When you remove a Defend from your deck, Upgrade this.

${ModID}:Oblivious.NAME: Oblivious
${ModID}:Oblivious.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 ${ModID}:Fish into your hand.
${ModID}:Oblivious.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 Upgraded ${ModID}:Fish into your hand.

${ModID}:SpoilerAlert.NAME: Spoiler Alert
${ModID}:SpoilerAlert.DESCRIPTION: Scry X+1. NL Play the top card of your draw pile.
${ModID}:SpoilerAlert.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scry X+2. NL Play the top card of your draw pile.

${ModID}:RodSlam.NAME: Rod Slam
${ModID}:RodSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw 1 fewer card.

${ModID}:NostalgicStrike.NAME: Nostalgic Strike
${ModID}:NostalgicStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return a random card from your discard pile to your hand.

${ModID}:FutureProofing.NAME: Future Proofing
${ModID}:FutureProofing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Scry !M!. NL Upgrade the top card of your draw pile this combat.

${ModID}:CardboardBullets.NAME: Cardboard Bullets
${ModID}:CardboardBullets.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the total cost of cards in your hand. NL X counts as 4.
${ModID}:CardboardBullets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the total cost of cards in your hand +3. NL X counts as 4.

${ModID}:FeedingFrenzy.NAME: Feeding Frenzy
${ModID}:FeedingFrenzy.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all ${ModID}:Fish. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each.

${ModID}:CatchOfTheDay.NAME: Catch of the Day
${ModID}:CatchOfTheDay.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, shuffle a ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile.
${ModID}:CatchOfTheDay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, shuffle a ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Baited.NAME: Baited
${ModID}:Baited.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a ${ModID}:Fish into your hand. NL If the enemy intends to attack, add !M! more.

${ModID}:AllOut.NAME: All Out
${ModID}:AllOut.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if your hand is empty, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:GarlicClove.NAME: Garlic Clove
${ModID}:GarlicClove.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Remove your Vulnerable and Frail. NL If you're not a Vampire, heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RingTheBell.NAME: Ring the Bell
${ModID}:RingTheBell.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose 13 HP. NL Put a *Curse *of *the *Bell on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:BigHaul.NAME: Big Haul
${ModID}:BigHaul.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! ${ModID}:Fish into your hand with Retain. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Bobber.NAME: Bobber
${ModID}:Bobber.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If you draw this during your turn, gain !${ModID}:m2! Block and !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Surprise.NAME: Surprise!
${ModID}:Surprise.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. When this card is drawn, deal 22 damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Harpoon.NAME: Harpoon
${ModID}:Harpoon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Fatal: At the start of next combat, shuffle !M! ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:WakaWaka.NAME: Waka Waka
${ModID}:WakaWaka.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Startup: Shuffle 2 *Power *Pellets into your draw pile.
${ModID}:WakaWaka.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Startup: Shuffle 2 *Power *Pellets into your draw pile.

${ModID}:ManifestMeal.NAME: Manifest Meal
${ModID}:ManifestMeal.DESCRIPTION: Put a *Food with X+1 on top of your draw pile. NL Draw 1 additional card next turn.
${ModID}:ManifestMeal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put a *Food with X+2 on top of your draw pile. NL Draw 1 additional card next turn.

${ModID}:Food.NAME: Food
${ModID}:Food.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain X [E]. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Food.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain X [E]. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Cannoneer.NAME: Cannoneer
${ModID}:Cannoneer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.

${ModID}:Calimari.NAME: Calimari
${ModID}:Calimari.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! *Octopi into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:DiscoverACrate.NAME: Discover a Crate
${ModID}:DiscoverACrate.DESCRIPTION: Add *Smite and *Safety into your hand. ${ModID}:Voyaged: Upgrade them. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:DiscoverACrate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add *Smite and *Safety into your hand. ${ModID}:Voyaged: Upgrade them.

${ModID}:BloodInTheWater.NAME: Blood in the Water
${ModID}:BloodInTheWater.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Consume. NL Gain 2 Strength. NL Gain 1 additional Strength for each ${ModID}:Fish consumed to play this.
${ModID}:BloodInTheWater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL ${ModID}:Consume. NL Gain 2 Strength. NL Gain 1 additional Strength for each ${ModID}:Fish consumed to play this.

${ModID}:SupplyTrip.NAME: Supply Trip
${ModID}:SupplyTrip.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until you have !M! in your hand. NL Gain !B! Block for each card drawn.

${ModID}:Whaling.NAME: Whaling
${ModID}:Whaling.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. NL If you have over 200 *Gold, spend 15 to gain an extra 1 Strength.
${ModID}:Whaling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL If you have over 200 *Gold, spend 15 to gain an extra 1 Strength.

${ModID}:Reserves.NAME: Reserves
${ModID}:Reserves.DESCRIPTION: After you play a cost X card, gain [E].

${ModID}:XMarksTheSpot.NAME: X Marks the Spot
${ModID}:XMarksTheSpot.DESCRIPTION: Add a random cost X card from another class into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:XMarksTheSpot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random cost X card from another class into your hand. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Splash.NAME: Splash
${ModID}:Splash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL This card's damage and Block are reduced by 2 for each other card in your hand.

${ModID}:DeckedOut.NAME: Decked Out
${ModID}:DeckedOut.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! *Plated *Armor. NL If you're on Steam Deck, gain !${ModID}:m2! Artifact.

${ModID}:ShipRam.NAME: Ship Ram
${ModID}:ShipRam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Voyaged: Deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:FlamingFlip.NAME: Flaming Flip
${ModID}:FlamingFlip.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL Draw 2 cards.

${ModID}:BoxOfHavoc.NAME: Box of Havoc
${ModID}:BoxOfHavoc.DESCRIPTION: Apply !${ModID}:m2! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Solo: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies instead.

${ModID}:Tripwire.NAME: Tripwire
${ModID}:Tripwire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your Block is broken this turn, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

${ModID}:Lie.NAME: Lie
${ModID}:Lie.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Add *Cheat into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Lie.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Add *Cheat+ into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Cheat.NAME: Cheat
${ModID}:Cheat.DESCRIPTION: Remove the enemy's Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add *Steal into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Cheat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove the enemy's Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add *Steal+ into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Steal.NAME: Steal
${ModID}:Steal.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has positive Strength, steal up to !M! of it. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SetupButWithRetain.NAME: Setup but with Retain
${ModID}:SetupButWithRetain.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL It costs 0 until played.

${ModID}:RatedX.NAME: Rated X
${ModID}:RatedX.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL X >= 1: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL X >= 2: Gain !M! Strength. NL X >= 4: Gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:ItWasTHIIIIIIISBig.NAME: It Was THIIIIIIIS Big!
${ModID}:ItWasTHIIIIIIISBig.DESCRIPTION: Triple the effects of ALL current ${ModID}:Fish cards. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:ItWasTHIIIIIIISBig.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Quadruple the effects of ALL current ${ModID}:Fish cards. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GoneFishing.NAME: Gone Fishing
${ModID}:GoneFishing.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Shuffle !M! ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ChocolateChipCookie.NAME: Chocolate Chip Cookie
${ModID}:ChocolateChipCookie.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity. NL Upgrade all cards in your hand this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:QuickestShot.NAME: Quickest Shot
${ModID}:QuickestShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL ${ModID}:Voyaged: Draw another card and gain [E].

${ModID}:BeachBoy.NAME: Beach Boy
${ModID}:BeachBoy.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! HP at the start of its turn.

${ModID}:AnglerForm.NAME: Angler Form
${ModID}:AnglerForm.DESCRIPTION: The first !M! times you play a card each turn, draw a card.

${ModID}:FinalFlourish.NAME: Final Flourish
${ModID}:FinalFlourish.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength this turn only. NL ${ModID}:Solo: Gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength next turn only instead.

${ModID}:FullHouse.NAME: Full House
${ModID}:FullHouse.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your draw pile. NL Shuffle !M! copies into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Fishbones.NAME: Fishbones
${ModID}:Fishbones.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each card in the Exhaust pile.

${ModID}:BeastSlayer.NAME: Beast Slayer
${ModID}:BeastSlayer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL In Elite combats, deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:AnchorsAweigh.NAME: Anchors Aweigh
${ModID}:AnchorsAweigh.DESCRIPTION: Startup: Gain !M! Block and [E]. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PickMe.NAME: Pick Me!
${ModID}:PickMe.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL When this appears in a card reward, the other cards are Upgraded.

${ModID}:TakeItEasy.NAME: Take it Easy
${ModID}:TakeItEasy.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Draw 1 fewer card each turn.

${ModID}:Hook.NAME: Hook
${ModID}:Hook.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile.

${ModID}:NoWhammies.NAME: No Whammies
${ModID}:NoWhammies.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL If any are Colorless, gain [E].

${ModID}:Crosshairs.NAME: Crosshairs
${ModID}:Crosshairs.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a cost X card, deal !M! damage to the frontmost enemy.

${ModID}:RidiculousFishing.NAME: Ridiculous Fishing
${ModID}:RidiculousFishing.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Colorless card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:TackleBox.NAME: Tackle Box
${ModID}:TackleBox.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! Colorless card.
${ModID}:TackleBox.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! Colorless cards.

${ModID}:Concentrated.NAME: Caffeinated
${ModID}:Concentrated.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E].
${ModID}:Concentrated.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E].

${ModID}:PlantFlag.NAME: Plant Flag
${ModID}:PlantFlag.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a *Flag on top of your draw pile.
${ModID}:PlantFlag.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a *Flag+ on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Flag.NAME: Flag
${ModID}:Flag.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:StarOfTheShow.NAME: Star of the Show
${ModID}:StarOfTheShow.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card with a star in its art, gain !M! Vigor.

${ModID}:RodOfHope.NAME: Rod of Hope
${ModID}:RodOfHope.DESCRIPTION: End your turn and take an additional one, in which you draw !M! fewer cards and gain 1 less [E]. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:RodOfHope.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: End your turn and take an additional one, in which you draw !M! fewer card and gain 1 less [E]. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SeeingStars.NAME: Seeing Stars
${ModID}:SeeingStars.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL If you have Block, apply !M! Weak.

${ModID}:QuestTimeTheSlimyPath.NAME: Quest Time: The Slimy Path
${ModID}:QuestTimeTheSlimyPath.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 3 *Slimed into your draw pile. NL ${ModID}:Quest: Exhaust 3 Slimed. NL *Reward: Put a ${ModID}:Legendary_Treasure on top of your draw pile.
${ModID}:QuestTimeTheSlimyPath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Shuffle 3 *Slimed into your draw pile. NL ${ModID}:Quest: Exhaust 3 Slimed. NL *Reward: Put a ${ModID}:Legendary_Treasure on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:GoldenLute.NAME: Golden Lute
${ModID}:GoldenLute.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Enemy loses !${ModID}:m2! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PastKillingGun.NAME: Past Killing Gun
${ModID}:PastKillingGun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the end of this combat, heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Rhaast.NAME: Rhaast
${ModID}:Rhaast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 3 times.

${ModID}:VictoryLap.NAME: Victory Lap
${ModID}:VictoryLap.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, add 1 *Twin *Shiv into your hand. NL If you won last run, gain !M! Strength.
${ModID}:VictoryLap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, add 1 *Twin *Shiv+ into your hand. NL If you won last run, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Starfish.NAME: Starfish
${ModID}:Starfish.DESCRIPTION: Return a card from your discard pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Starfish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Return a card from your discard pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Maw.NAME: Maw
${ModID}:Maw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Eel.NAME: Eel
${ModID}:Eel.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Eel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SearingSight.NAME: Searing Sight
${ModID}:SearingSight.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random cards and add it into your hand. NL Can be Upgraded 3 times.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random Upgraded cards and add it into your hand. NL Can be Upgraded 3 times.
Choose 1 of !M! random Upgraded cards and add it into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

${ModID}:HolyGrail.NAME: Holy Grail
${ModID}:HolyGrail.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]  and draw 1 additional card at the start of your turn.
${ModID}:HolyGrail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]  and draw 2 additional cards at the start of your turn.

${ModID}:MacGuffin.NAME: MacGuffin
${ModID}:MacGuffin.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:FishOPedia.NAME: Fish-o-pedia
${ModID}:FishOPedia.DESCRIPTION: Add a ${ModID}:Fish that you haven't played this combat into your hand. NL If you've played them all, instead gain 4 Strength.
${ModID}:FishOPedia.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a ${ModID}:Fish that you haven't played this combat into your hand and Upgrade it. NL If you've played them all, instead gain 4 Strength.

${ModID}:SignpostCard.NAME: Message
${ModID}:SignpostCard.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose a card in your hand. NL Shuffle a copy of it into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:SignpostCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose a card in your hand. NL Shuffle a copy of it into your draw pile.

${ModID}:FinishingTouches.NAME: Finishing Touches
${ModID}:FinishingTouches.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card, if it's the only one in your hand, play it twice.

${ModID}:FlyingFish.NAME: Flying Fish
${ModID}:FlyingFish.DESCRIPTION: Take 50% less damage for !M! turn. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:FlyingFish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Take 50% less damage for !M! turns. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Jellyfish.NAME: Jellyfish
${ModID}:Jellyfish.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Zapped. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Neow.NAME: The Whale
${ModID}:Neow.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! HP. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Swordfish.NAME: Swordfish
${ModID}:Swordfish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:DoomsdayClock.NAME: Doomsday Clock
${ModID}:DoomsdayClock.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL At the end of !M! turns, deal !${ModID}:m2! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:LostStaff.NAME: Lost Staff
${ModID}:LostStaff.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Enter Divinity. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MassProduction.NAME: Mass Production
${ModID}:MassProduction.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 card in your hand. NL Add !M! copies of it that cost 0 into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:DefinitelyUntrappedIdol.NAME: Definitely Untrapped Idol
${ModID}:DefinitelyUntrappedIdol.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Gold. NL Shuffle a *Rolling *Boulder into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:DefinitelyUntrappedIdol.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Gold. NL Shuffle a *Rolling *Boulder+ into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RollingBoulder.NAME: Rolling Boulder
${ModID}:RollingBoulder.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is drawn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:SpinAttack.NAME: Spin Attack
${ModID}:SpinAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Discard 1 card.

${ModID}:AquaOrb.NAME: Aqua Orb
${ModID}:AquaOrb.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Solo: Play the top card of your draw pile.

${ModID}:FreeDrinks.NAME: Free Drinks
${ModID}:FreeDrinks.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw 1 additional card. NL When you obtain this, obtain a random Potion.
